Articles.Content:
Hello all im now addicted to a game that runs like ....e. I picked up this game about 2 weeks ago and absolutely love playing it. as of yesterday i have began experiencing really crappy glitch in the game so im looking to the community for support since like most games the players know more than the devs.

Installed mods.

FMRS

Chatter

Engineer

Alarm Clock

Stage Recovery

EVE

Lights and clouds

no large part or texture packs

CPU i7 4790k

GPU GTX 970

RAM 16GB

OS Win 8.1

Issues

1. Career mode. anyplace other than Space Station or in one of the buildings at the space center my funds and sometimes my science is displayed as all zeros.

2. Career mode. Not every time but just a matter of time when ever i mouse over or click the resource tab or the contracts tab to access the info needed ksp will freeze and shortly after ill receive "ksp.exe is not responding" and have to close the program as it will not respond no matter how much i pray or wait.

any guidance is greatly appreciated and if u need a letter of recommendation to hopefully steal a game devs job ill be happy to oblige.
Please see the how to get support sticky thread in this subforum for details of how to find and upload your output_log.txt file after one of these hangs.

Please see the how to get support sticky thread in this subforum for details of how to find and upload your output_log.txt file after one of these hangs.

Thanks. First i think ill copy my save and do a fresh install. ill come back later with more info if i see its happening again.

-force-opengl is your friend.

instructions to have opengl:

create a shortcut of ksp.exe and RIGHT CLICK.

go to properties.

thete are 2 boxes. i recommand deleting the text at the bottom : start in

the top box : "game directory" -force-opengl <--- add this at the end

done! enjoy!

if still having problems... KSP active texture manager is your friend.

-force-opengl is your friend.

instructions to have opengl:

create a shortcut of ksp.exe and RIGHT CLICK.

go to properties.

thete are 2 boxes. i recommand deleting the text at the bottom : start in

the top box : "game directory" -force-opengl <--- add this at the end

done! enjoy!

if still having problems... KSP active texture manager is your friend.

ok I have tried ATM and now open gl. neither worked and when i get time ill actually wipe it and track it to see if its vanilla or mod induced.

update:

I uninstalled ksp, deleted ksp file folders from drive, and then reinstalled ksp cleanly other than a copy of my career save file. Immediately the game began sticking every time i moused over or clicked the contracts and or the resource tab and then about five minutes in it froze up giving me the "ksp.exe is not responding" error. So it is not a mod issue but if anyone knows where to point me feel free. Ill update if i find answers else where.
Please also test a new save, and if it still occurs please upload your output_log.txt
